55 template <class MATRIX, typename inverse_type=typename MATRIX::value_type>
56 class RelaxationBlock :
57  protected PreconditionBlockBase<inverse_type>
58 {
59 private:
63  typedef typename MATRIX::value_type number;
64 
68  typedef inverse_type value_type;
69 
70 public:
74  typedef types::global_dof_index size_type;
75 
79  class AdditionalData : public Subscriptor
80  {
81  public:
85  AdditionalData (const double relaxation = 1.,
86  const bool invert_diagonal = true,
87  const bool same_diagonal = false);
88 
96  AdditionalData (const BlockList &block_list,
97  const double relaxation = 1.,
98  const bool invert_diagonal = true,
99  const bool same_diagonal = false) DEAL_II_DEPRECATED;
100 
101 
105  SparsityPattern block_list;
106 
110  double relaxation;
111 
115  bool invert_diagonal;
116 
120  bool same_diagonal;
124  typename PreconditionBlockBase<inverse_type>::Inversion inversion;
125 
132  double threshold;
133 
155  std::vector<std::vector<unsigned int> > order;
159  std::size_t memory_consumption() const;
160  };
161 
170  void initialize (const MATRIX &A,
171  const AdditionalData &parameters);
172 
178  void clear();
179 
183  bool empty () const;
184 
189  value_type el(size_type i,
190  size_type j) const;
191 
207  void invert_diagblocks();
208 
209 protected:
218  template <typename number2>
219  void do_step (
220  Vector<number2> &dst,
221  const Vector<number2> &prev,
222  const Vector<number2> &src,
223  const bool backward) const;
231  SmartPointer<const MATRIX,RelaxationBlock<MATRIX,inverse_type> > A;
232 
236  SmartPointer<const AdditionalData, RelaxationBlock<MATRIX,inverse_type> > additional_data;
237 };

256 template<class MATRIX, typename inverse_type = typename MATRIX::value_type>
257 class RelaxationBlockJacobi : public virtual Subscriptor,
258  protected RelaxationBlock<MATRIX, inverse_type>
259 {
260 public:
264 // RelaxationBlockJacobi();
265 
269  typedef typename MATRIX::value_type number;
270 
274  using typename RelaxationBlock<MATRIX,inverse_type>::AdditionalData;
275 
280  using RelaxationBlock<MATRIX, inverse_type>::initialize;
281 
285  using RelaxationBlock<MATRIX, inverse_type>::clear;
286 
290  using RelaxationBlock<MATRIX, inverse_type>::empty;
294  using RelaxationBlock<MATRIX, inverse_type>::size;
298  using RelaxationBlock<MATRIX, inverse_type>::inverse;
302  using RelaxationBlock<MATRIX, inverse_type>::inverse_householder;
306  using RelaxationBlock<MATRIX, inverse_type>::inverse_svd;
307  using PreconditionBlockBase<inverse_type>::log_statistics;
311  template <typename number2>
312  void step (Vector<number2> &dst, const Vector<number2> &rhs) const;
313 
317  template <typename number2>
318  void Tstep (Vector<number2> &dst, const Vector<number2> &rhs) const;
319 
323  std::size_t memory_consumption() const;
324 };

342 template<class MATRIX, typename inverse_type = typename MATRIX::value_type>
343 class RelaxationBlockSOR : public virtual Subscriptor,
344  protected RelaxationBlock<MATRIX, inverse_type>
345 {
346 public:
350 // RelaxationBlockSOR();
351 
355  typedef typename MATRIX::value_type number;
356 
360  using typename RelaxationBlock<MATRIX,inverse_type>::AdditionalData;
361 
366  using RelaxationBlock<MATRIX, inverse_type>::initialize;
367 
371  using RelaxationBlock<MATRIX, inverse_type>::clear;
372 
376  using RelaxationBlock<MATRIX, inverse_type>::empty;
380  using RelaxationBlock<MATRIX, inverse_type>::size;
384  using RelaxationBlock<MATRIX, inverse_type>::inverse;
388  using RelaxationBlock<MATRIX, inverse_type>::inverse_householder;
392  using RelaxationBlock<MATRIX, inverse_type>::inverse_svd;
393  using PreconditionBlockBase<inverse_type>::log_statistics;
397  template <typename number2>
398  void step (Vector<number2> &dst, const Vector<number2> &rhs) const;
399 
403  template <typename number2>

424 template<class MATRIX, typename inverse_type = typename MATRIX::value_type>
425 class RelaxationBlockSSOR : public virtual Subscriptor,
426  protected RelaxationBlock<MATRIX, inverse_type>
427 {
428 public:
432  typedef typename MATRIX::value_type number;

443 
447  using RelaxationBlock<MATRIX, inverse_type>::clear;
448 
452  using RelaxationBlock<MATRIX, inverse_type>::empty;
453 
457  using RelaxationBlock<MATRIX, inverse_type>::size;
461  using RelaxationBlock<MATRIX, inverse_type>::inverse;
465  using RelaxationBlock<MATRIX, inverse_type>::inverse_householder;
469  using RelaxationBlock<MATRIX, inverse_type>::inverse_svd;
470  using PreconditionBlockBase<inverse_type>::log_statistics;
474  template <typename number2>
475  void step (Vector<number2> &dst, const Vector<number2> &rhs) const;
476 
480  template <typename number2>
